name: @capacitor-community/media
description: Capacitor plugin for saving and retrieving photos and videos, and managing photo albums.
author: Nisala Kalupahana

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: cd ios && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace Plugin.xcworkspace -scheme Plugin -destination generic/platform=iOS && cd ..
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check && npm run swiftlint -- lint
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write && npm run swiftlint -- autocorrect --format
scripts.docgen: docgen --api MediaPlugin --output-readme README.md --output-json dist/docs.json && cp -rf README.md dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run docgen && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
